TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XsltConvert extends System.Object
public ref class XsltConvert abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含 XSLT 使用的轉換常式。

span.span: Contains conversion routines used by XSLT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些轉換可分為下列三個類別：These conversions fall into the following three categories: - 內部類型的內部型別： 這些是五個 XSLT 型別之間的轉換五種類型。Internal type to internal type: These are conversions from one of the five XSLT types to another of the five types. - 內部類型的外部型別： 這些是從任何 Xsd 型別轉換為其中五個 XSLT 型別。External type to internal type: These are conversions from any of the Xsd types to one of the five XSLT types. - 外部類型的內部型別： 這些是從其中五個 XSLT 型別轉換為任何 Xsd 型別。Internal type to external type: These are conversions from one of the five XSLT types to any of the Xsd types.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> EnsureNodeSet (System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem> listItems);

summary.span: 確認物件的指定序列不是樹狀片段的結果，而且該序列可以轉換為節點集。

span.span: Ensures that the specified sequence of objects is not a result tree fragment and that it can be converted to a node set.
